name: RETRACE YOUR STEPS
description:
• READ BEFORE PLAYING -------------------------------------->
  • First I want to Thank you for even condisdering my game.
  • This is a simple memory game I made to compete in the Brackeys GameJam  with the theme "REWIND" it's not very good but I think it's not bad too I would like to know if anyone was able to actually finish the game .

TUTORIAL 

  • Once in a level allow the pieces or "persons" to be moved to their correct positions  until the button located at the bottom says "READY".
  • The aim of the game is to "REWIND" or "RETRACE"  the movements of each "person" but starting out with the person who reached their destination last to the person who reached their destination first.
  • When the button says "READY" move click on the person you wish to move then use the ARROW keys or WASD to move, BUT  be careful because if the incorrect person is selected to move and you try to move you will lose a life and you only get three per level or you'll have to start the level again.
  • So that's it and I would like to know if anyone was able to beat the game, it's not that difficult though just a test of memory. Note it's not a very good game.,  it is my first JAM and my second officially completed game.

||    THANK YOU    ||
